AABBComponent(GameObject) - Constructor for class com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components.AABBComponent
Primary Constructor.
AABBComponent(GameObject, int) - Constructor for class com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components.AABBComponent
Secondary constructor for making AABB with different conditions Type 1: no padding Type 2: no padding AND this objects isnt actually moving so will set positon last frame manually, not in the AABB Update - used for Collision Tester Objects which simulate collision wihtout actually moving
AABBComponent(TileObject, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components.AABBComponent
AABB constructor for temporary/single frame tile hitboxes
AABBComponent(TileObject) - Constructor for class com.gussssy.gametwo.game.components.AABBComponent
AABBConstructor for when creating an AABBComponent that will be modiffied later for collision with tiles.
